title: Five terrorists killed in three separate IBOs in KP
content:
RAWALPINDI, Jul 29 (APP): The Security Forces have killed five terrorists in three separate intelligence-based operations conducted on July 28 and 29 in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa (KP).
A joint intelligence-based operation was conducted in Mohmand District and three terrorists, including Kharji alias Qari of Fitna Al Khawarij, were successfully neutralised.
During the conduct of the operation, terrorists’ hideout was also busted and a cache of arms, ammunition and explosives was recovered.
However, during an intense fire exchange, Police Constable Abrar Hussain (resident of District Swabi) of KP Police, having fought gallantly, embraced Shahadat (martyrdom).
In another intelligence-based operation conducted in Dera Ismail Khan District, security forces effectively engaged terrorists’ location, as a result of which Kharji Sifatullah alias Mullah Mansoor of Fitna Al Khawarij was sent to hell, while three other terrorists got injured.
Kharji Sifatullah was involved in numerous terrorist activities in the area including facilitation of suicide bombing attack in Daraban on December 12, 2023 and was highly wanted by law enforcement agencies.
In a third engagement that occurred in North Waziristan District, another Kharji terrorist of Fitna Al Khawarij was sent to hell by the security forces.
“Pakistan’s Security Forces stand shoulder to shoulder with other law enforcement agencies to ensure peace and stability across Pakistan and such sacrifices of our brave men further strengthen our resolve,” the ISPR said.
